mapper.select: SELECT cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_date =#{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE cash SET cash_kind =#{cashKind}, category_name =#{categoryName}, cash_price=#{cashPrice}, cash_place =#{cashPlace}, cash_memo =#{cashMemo} WHERE member_id=#{memberId}
